flavorText: Nomads weave tales thicker than tapestries.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Sagen der Nomaden sind dichter gewebt als ihre Wandteppiche.
foreignData.name: Sagenerzähler der Nomaden
foreignData.text: {W}, {T}: Bringe eine Kreaturenverzauberungskarte deiner Wahl aus einem Friedhof ins Spiel und verzaubere mit ihr eine Kreatur, die du kontrollierst. (Du kontrollierst diese Verzauberung.)

foreignData.flavorText: La trama de los cuentos de los nómadas es más complicada que la trama de sus tapices.
foreignData.name: Creamitos nómada
foreignData.text: {W}, {T}: Pon en juego la carta objetivo de encantar criatura de un cementerio y encanta con ella a una criatura que controles. (Tú controlas ese encantamiento.)

foreignData.flavorText: Les nomades tissent des récits plus épais que des tapisseries.
foreignData.name: Mythifieur nomade
foreignData.text: {W}, {T}: Mettez en jeu, en enchantant une créature que vous contrôlez, la carte d'enchantement de créature ciblée en provenance d'un cimetière. (Vous contrôlez cet enchantement.)

foreignData.flavorText: I nomadi tessono racconti più fitti di un arazzo.
foreignData.name: Cantastorie Nomade
foreignData.text: {W}, {T}: Metti in gioco una carta Incanta Creatura bersaglio presente in un cimitero per incantare una creatura che controlli (tu controlli quell'incantesimo).

foreignData.flavorText: Os nômades tecem lendas mais grossas que tapeçarias.
foreignData.name: Nômade Criador de Mitos
foreignData.text: {W}, {T}: Coloque em jogo o card alvo de encantar criatura de um cemitério, encantando uma criatura que você controla. (Você controla aquele encantamento.)

name: Nomad Mythmaker
originalText:
o
W, oc
T: Put target enchant creature card from a graveyard into play enchanting a creature you control. (You control that enchantment.)

rulings.text: You don’t choose which creature the Aura will enter the battlefield attached to until the ability resolves. You must choose a creature the Aura can legally enchant. (For example, you can’t choose a creature with protection from black if the targeted Aura card is black.) If you don’t control any creatures that the Aura can enchant, it remains in the graveyard.
Nomad Mythmaker’s ability can target an Aura card in any graveyard, not just yours.

text: {W}, {T}: Put target Aura card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control attached to a creature you control.
